remarks: Closure of the row replacement function for square matrices. (Contributed by AV, 13-Feb-2019.)
statement:
marrepcl.a $e |- A = ( N Mat R ) $.
marrepcl.b $e |- B = ( Base ` A ) $.
marrepcl $p |- ( ( ( R e. Ring /\ M e. B /\ S e. ( Base ` R ) ) /\ ( K e. N /\ L e. N ) ) -> ( K ( M ( N matRRep R ) S ) L ) e. B ) $.
